snippet.title: Depixtion Halloween 1.5 Trailer
snippet.description: Depixtion: Halloween is a chilling expansion for the puzzle game Depixtion, in which you create grotesque works of art using logic. Based on the popular Picross series, Depixtion: Halloween blends color mixing mechanics with the rules of nonograms to create a uniquely colorful, and horrifying experience.
